Message:
I have the ability to see
the power hidden in others.

Someone said it was
the power to see others’ souls...
But, I don’t know much
about it myself.

All that matters is that
the heavens bestowed me
with this sacred acuity,
which allows me to aid
those who are trying
their hardest in life.

Someone trying their hardest
is the most beautiful sight
in the world.

That’s because,
a person’s purpose in life
isn’t a destination to arrive to,
it’s defined by the path they walk.

So, over the years,
I’ve used this power of mine
to send off countless pupils.

But, one day,
in the midst of my teachings,
a family of nobles from the region
asked if I would take a look
at their daughter for them.

Requests like that were made
to me surprisingly often.
Witches were feared
and persecuted, but if they could
learn how to control their power,
they could also learn how to hide
their true identity, after all.
But, when that girl stood before me,

the power hidden within her
moved me to tears...
